hadiths.text: It has been narrated by Salama b. al-Akwa' that he visited al-Hajjaj who said to him:O son of al-Akwa', you have turned apostate and have come to live again in the desert with the Bedouins (after your migration). He said: No, but the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) has permitted me to live in the desert

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ رُجُوعِ الْمُهَاجِرِ إِلَى اسْتِيطَانِ وَطَنِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition against a Muhajir returning to settle in his former homeland
